chunks.text:
Here's a first look at the next chapter of ConnectForHealth 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ApXDCgQl4SNp2zGuohNf4N9g3?domain=app.info.cignaglobal.com> 	  	  <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3303256f-b00c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B9bb92e7f-2a1e-4455-b3fb-ee5c122e7f9d%7D_cfh_new.png> 	
ConnectForHealth has levelled up! We’re making it easier to get practical insights from health experts. 


ConnectForHealth is also now available as a podcast! 

Our new format brings you the same trusted expert-led learnings on well-being topics - from mental health to financial wellness - still featuring medical professionals, psychologists, and wellness coaches. 


Here’s what you can expect: 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bf931851f-81a3-4d2a-9b63-08b341110db6%7D_convenience.png> 	 	 Greater convenience: 
Watch or listen anytime, anywhere — whether it's during a workout or on your commute. Catch up at your own pace, or be part of the live conversation. 

 	 
 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B7a710662-284f-4870-a363-5c493246c697%7D_convenience.png> 	 	 Engaging, conversational format: 
Dynamic expert perspectives, and easy-to-digest guidance.

chunks.text:
<https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B7a710662-284f-4870-a363-5c493246c697%7D_convenience.png> 	 	 Engaging, conversational format: 
Dynamic expert perspectives, and easy-to-digest guidance. 


You are invited to join our next ConnectForHealth session: Improving Mobility and Flexibility 


Learn how you can enhance your body’s health and vitality with simple, effective movements to help keep you strong, agile and pain-free for years to come. 

Did you know? 


Musculoskeletal (MSK) conditions affect more than 1.7 billion people globally. 

Join us live for the next session on May 28 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/C8MzCjOo4FAPqxRu5iwfmJB96?domain=event.on24.com> 	

Meet our guest speaker 

 <https://images.info.cignaglobal.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B4694ac37-7bbb-4ec6-930a-41ce6c365661%7D_Sarah_Lindsay.png> 	
Sarah Lindsay 
Personal Trainer and Founder, Roar Fitness 

 	  	 
The ConnectForHealth calendar <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/szyICkOp4F41QJ5I9sPfGN-9R?domain=ghb.cigna.com>  is packed with powerful conversations you won’t want to miss. Make sure you’re tuned in from day one! 

 	 
If you face any problems with registration, please write to us on meacommunications@cigna.com <mailto:meacommunications@cigna.com>
